name: ltdr_yearly_max
title: Normalized Difference Vegatation Index - NDVI (Yearly Maximum using LTDR v4)
description: Yearly maximum value for Normalized Difference Vegatation Index (NDVI). Created using the NASA Long Term Data Record (v4).
